top.title: Email by 'A' from 'Balmoral' asked Ghislaine Maxwell for 'inappropriate friends', Epstein files show
top.summary: A newly released email sent to Ghislane Maxwell from "A" is among the latest set of Epstein files released by the US' House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

top.title: Trump trips, a fake video and 10 possible co-conspirators - Takeaways from new Epstein files
top.summary: The largest release of Epstein-related documents yet from the justice department included some notable messages and several mentions of Trump.

top.title: Australia to deport British man charged with displaying Nazi symbols
top.summary: The immigration minister said the man is an unwelcome "guest" in Australia.

top.title: US denies visas to ex-EU commissioner and others over social media rules
top.summary: Thierry Breton, the former top tech regulator at the European Commission, says a "witch hunt" is taking place.

top.title: TikTok removes AI weight loss ads from fake Boots account
top.summary: The adverts for prescription-only drugs showed healthcare professionals impersonating the British retailer.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.

title.#text: Trump administration bars former EU official and anti-disinformation and hate researchers from US
